coverPage.additionalInformation: BlackRock Japan Co., Ltd. is an institutionalinvestment manager based in Japan and is subject to Section13(f) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 and the rulespromulgated thereunder. BlackRock Japan Co., Ltd. is asubsidiary of BlackRock, Inc. The securities positionsreported by BlackRock Japan Co., Ltd., are also beingreported on behalf of BlackRock, Inc. However, BlackRock, Inc.does not exercise, and therefore disclaims, investment discretionwith respect to any Section 13(f) securities positions overwhich BlackRock Japan Co., Ltd. exercises such discretion.
